description: Former special Christopher Gliddon, 28, appears before magistrates charged with sexual assault.
title: Police special in court over sexual assault charge
title_page: Essex Police special in court over sexual assault charge - BBC News
maintext:
A former police special superintendent has appeared in court charged with sexual assault.
Christopher Gliddon, 28, from Great Bardfield near Braintree in Essex, appeared at Ipswich Magistrates' Court.
The court heard Mr Gliddon was accused of one count of sexual assault, which was alleged to have taken place between January 2019 and July 2021.
He did not enter a plea and was granted conditional bail.
